div.p: A list of key images associated with this report. The images are generally created during the diagnostic process, and may be directly of the patient, or of treated specimens (i.e. slides of interest).

short.value: A text note containing additional details, explanation, description, comment, or summarization.

definition.value: A text note containing additional details, explanation, description, comment, or summarization.

short.value: A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare. The actual content may be inline or provided by direct reference.
